comments.html:
Amen, in general. In fact, I have almost never been able to attend a full live webinar held during the work day. You need to plan to be able to get away.

However, if a significant part of the benefit was for people to "be stuck in the same hotel for three days" so that discussions "extend well into the evening", then there are a lot of better places than Miami to hold it. Right outside of Newark airport, for example...
comments.name: JHand

comments.html:
Let me say that, even if I follow regularly the blog and the online courses, a live workshop will provide to you the occasion to understand things deeper and fix the concepts much clearer.
Ivan, do I deserve something? ;-)
comments.name: Unknown
